title: Sony Vegas Pro 9.0c Build 896 [32.64 bit][MULTi][Full+Plug-in]
description:
Sony Vegas Pro 9.0c Build 896 [32.64 bit][MULTi][Full+Plug-in]

Operating system: Windows XP (32 and 64 bit), Vista (32 and 64 bit) and Windows 7 (32 and 64 bit) 
Languages: English, Spanish, French, German and Japanese 
Format: Iso

Sony Vegas Pro 9 is a powerful video editor aimed at users looking for professionals or professional results. It combines powerful audio and video editing in a single, comprehensive development platform. 
This comprehensive suite offers the most robust and progressive platform for content creation and production. Sony Vegas Pro 9, improving its interface and includes new editing tools, among which include the ability to capture AVCHD video without the need for intermediate conversions. 

As for video editing, capture devices Vegas offers high quality, over 300 effects and transitions, support for editing and creating subtitles, encoding MPEG2 (for DVDs), import SWF files (Flash animation), and much more . 

Its capacity in terms of audio processing is also not far behind, supporting an unlimited number of simultaneous tracks, support for 5.1 channel more than 30 customizable effects and the possibility of increasing its capacity and range thanks to support for VST plugins. 

Precise editing tools. You can edit video in HD or SD with drag and drop, cut with the mouse or keyboard. Features include ProType Titling technology, multicamera editing tools, 32-bit video processing, customizable window layouts, improved HDV / SDI / XDCAM, Cinescore plug-in support, A / V synchronization detection and repair, and auto-frame quantization. 

What are the top features to consider Sony Vegas Pro 9? 

Mainly are 6: 
Native support for all video formats in SD and HD. 
Extensive format support, including XDCAM EX and Red One 
Authoring for Blu-Ray very intuitive. 
Support for projects in 4K, about 4096 x 4096 resolution. 
The most powerful audio editing tools available in a nonlinear editing system. [Edit audio without using other software] 
It includes native versions of Vegas Pro 9 to 32 and 64 bits. 

In addition, other details: 
You can use an unlimited number of video tracks when creating your work. 
Sophisticated effects liluminaciÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â³n; The Vegas Pro 9 includes over 190 customizable video effects, including a series of lighting effects. 
Large multi-format video support: Supports natively on the new line of professional cameras XDCAM EX and RED One, very fashionable these days. It also includes support for still images over 1 Gigapixel resolution. Pan-Crop can use to create film sequences with large-size images, keeping the HD resolution. 
Superior Audio Control; Use unlimited tracks, 24-bit/192 kHz audio, 5.1 surround mixing, effects automation, and compression / expansion of time. Apply audio effects in real time, like EQ, Reverb, Delay, and more, all customizable. Expand your audio processing and mixing options with support for DirectX Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® and VST audio plug-ins. Use the mixing console for a more precise audio control.
